interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Vitamin C Serum 2 fl. oz with L'Ascorbic Acid - Facial Skin Care & Anti Aging Serum That Helps Skin Brightening, Repair Sun Damage, Fade Age Spots, Dark Circles, Wrinkles & Fine Lines Review Date: 2016/07/03 Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Item Weight': '0.31 Pounds', 'Unit Count': '2 Fl Oz', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.83 x 3.46 x 2.2 inches; 4.96 Ounces', 'UPC': '602519445008'} Review Text: Very light feeling, clear serum that sinks into my skin with no stickiness at all. It doesn't feel 'tacky' on my skin, but I'm so dry that it just soaked it right up!
The glass dropper is long enough to reach the bottom of the glass jar. Looks and feels very 'vintage, like something off of an Apothecary's shelf. If you're not a fan of the dropper, you can just use the bottle top that it comes with.
I didn't notice any discernable scent to this. Not floral, not perfumey, just clean. As soon as I rubbed it in, there was NO smell left on my hands. It just disappeared. This is one for the beauty stand. Very good quality and I'm happy to have been able to test this at a reduced price from the company. Review Title: So light and soaked right into my skin Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Key Preferences:**
  - Enjoys lightweight skincare products that absorb quickly without a sticky residue.
  - Values products that help with hydration and skin repair, particularly for dry skin.
  - Prefers minimalist scents in skincare, with a preference for clean, non-perfumed options.
  - Appreciates quality design elements, especially vintage or classic aesthetics in packaging.
  - Open to trying new products, especially if offered at a reduced price.

- **Behavior Patterns:**
  - Engages with skincare focused on anti-aging properties, highlighting a commitment to addressing signs of aging such as wrinkles and dark circles.
  - Tends to evaluate product quality significantly, as indicated by the extensive review detailing both positive attributes and product experience.
  - Displays a thoughtful approach in sharing experiences, indicating a desire to inform others about product effectiveness.
  
Overall, the user exhibits a strong interest in effective, aesthetically pleasing skincare solutions that prioritize hydration and anti-aging benefits.
